title: Ikebukuro PR Anime
synopsis: The anime's story takes place in the year 2020, near the Hareza Tower building plaza. This is an area under development currently but is expected to be completed by 2020. A girl gives chase to an owl she sees in Ikebukuro. Over the course of the anime, the audience witnesses the girl grow and learns about the charm of Ikebukuro, a place where "everyone can be the lead player."
staff: [['Takatsu, Yukio', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Editing', ' Layout', ' Director of Photography', ' Animation Director', ' 2nd Key Animation']], ['Yoshida, Reiko', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Watanabe, Akio', ['Character Design']]]
